trans-unit.source: Supplies base class implementation for all activity designer theme classes used in a workflow design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: Fontes de base de implementação de classe para todas as classes de tema designer de atividade utilizada num ambiente de tempo de criação do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] All classes that supply theme property settings to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes must inherit from the DesignerTheme class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Todas as classes que fornecem definições de propriedade de tema para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>classes tem de herdar da classe de DesignerTheme.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Designer themes provide a set of property values with which to display background and foreground colors and styles, fonts, and other style settings for the designer classes displayed on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Temas estruturador fornecem um conjunto de valores de propriedade com o qual a apresentar em segundo plano e cores de primeiro plano e estilos, tipos de letra e outras definições de estilo para as classes de estruturador apresentadas na superfície de desenho fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> class also inherits from DesignerTheme.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>classe herda também DesignerTheme.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> class by using a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada numa classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"> </xref> classe utilizando um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> with which the designer theme is associated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"> </xref> com que o tema estruturador está associado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do tipo estruturador nos quais é aplicado o tema estruturador não qualificado.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyTo property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ApplyTo associa o tema estruturador um designer, utilizando o nome do tipo de estruturador não qualificado enquanto o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A>propriedade associa o tema estruturador com um tipo de estruturador utilizando o <xref:System.Type>do designer.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.
trans-unit.target: O nome do tipo estruturador nos quais o tema designer é aplicado.

trans-unit.source: A user attempted a set operation when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*> property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um utilizador tentada uma operação de definição quando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*>propriedade foi definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow theme that encapsulates the designer theme.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tema do fluxo de trabalho que encapsula o tema do estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The ContainingTheme property returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> object that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> used during initialization.
trans-unit.target: Devolve de propriedade ContainingTheme o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>objeto que o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A>utilizado durante a inicialização.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"> </xref> objeto associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the designer associated with the designer theme.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo do designer associado o tema do estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerType property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DesignerType associa o tema estruturador com um tipo de estruturador utilizando o <xref:System.Type>do designer, enquanto o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A>propriedade associa o tema estruturador um designer, utilizando o nome do tipo estruturador não qualificado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Possible values for this property include <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, and any classes created by activity designer developers that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.
trans-unit.target: Os valores possíveis para esta propriedade incluem <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>e quaisquer classes criadas por programadores designer de atividade que herdam <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the designer to be associated with the current designer theme.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>que representa o estruturador de estar associado o tema estruturador atual.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A user attempted a set operation when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*> property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um utilizador tentada uma operação de definição quando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*>propriedade foi definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Allows the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> to attempt to free resources and perform other clean-up operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"> </xref> para tentar libertar recursos e efetuar outras operações de limpeza antes de que reclamada a através da recolha de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Finalize releases only unmanaged resources prior to garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Finalize versões únicos recursos não geridas antes da recolha de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Performs further initialization tasks beyond those performed by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Adicional efetua tarefas de inicialização para além daquelas realizado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> class provides no default behavior for this method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>classe não fornece nenhum comportamento predefinido para este método.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> must provide their own logic for this method.
trans-unit.target: Classes de herdar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>tem de fornecer as suas próprias lógica para este método.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer theme class that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica a classe de designer tema que foram alteradas as definições de propriedade de ambiente para o estruturador.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> use this method to make necessary changes when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration value changes from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>.
trans-unit.target: Classes de herdar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>Utilize este método para tornar necessário é alterado quando as <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>alterações de valor de enumeração de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>ou <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration determines where a designer theme obtains its ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>enumeração determina onde um tema estruturador obtém as definições de propriedade de ambiente.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>valor for definido, a classe de designer tema obtém as definições do ambiente de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the operating system on which the designer is installed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>valor for definido, a classe de designer tema obtém as definições de ambiente do sistema operativo no qual o estruturador está instalado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"></xref> enumeration value that the designer theme should now use.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"> </xref> valor de enumeração que agora deve utilizar o estruturador tema.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer theme is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o tema designer é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> is initialized with is not a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), ReadOnly obtains its value from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>que o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>foi inicializado com não é uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic), ReadOnly obtém o valor da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is a null reference (`Nothing`), ReadOnly is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>é uma referência nula (`Nothing`), é só de leitura `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is assigned to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, the ReadOnly property is set to `true`, and properties on all designer themes associated with this theme cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>está atribuído ao <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, a propriedade só de leitura está definida como `true`, e não não possível alterar as propriedades de todos os temas estruturador associados a este tema.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>

trans-unit.source: If required, properties can be set after loading the theme but before assigning it to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se necessário, propriedades podem ser definidas depois de carregar o tema, mas antes de atribui-lo a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"> </xref> é só de leitura; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas definidas pela aplicação associadas a libertar, libertar ou repor recursos não geridos.

trans-unit.source: This version of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>implementa o <xref:System.IDisposable>interface.</xref:System.IDisposable> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>
